description:
Trade Agreement:  Canadian Free Trade Agreement

Tendering Procedures: To all pre-qualified suppliers under Supply Arrangement E60PV-19EQUI

Competitive Procurement Strategy: Combination of mandatory requirements and cost.

Comprehensive Land Claim Agreement: No 

Nature of Requirements: One (1) Bomb Calorimeter, 01R11-24-C060, 
Camille Sobczak, 204-430-5426, camille.sobczak@agr.gc.ca


THIS REQUEST IS RESERVED FOR HOLDERS OF SUPPLY ARRANGEMENT # E60PV-19EQUI ONLY, FOR THE PURCHASE OF LABORATORY AND SCIENTIFIC EQUIPMENT, PARTS AND ACCESSORIES, SERVICES AND SUPPLIES.

Only Suppliers currently pre-qualified on Supply Arrangement E60PV-19EQUI have been invited to bid.

As a requirement of the Supply Arrangement, this notice is published on Government Electronic Tendering Service (GETS) for a period of 40 calendar days. The closing date published on this notice identifies how long the notice will be published. For the closing date of any solicitation under the supply arrangement, invited suppliers should refer to the solicitation documents. 

Suppliers that do not have a Supply Arrangement for the supply of Laboratory and Scientific Equipment, Parts and Accessories, Services and Supplies with Public Works and Government Services Canada, cannot submit a bid. Any bids received from suppliers not pre-qualified on the Supply Arrangement will not be evaluated.

Suppliers may qualify under Supply Arrangement E60PV-19EQUI for Laboratory and Scientific Equipment, Parts and Accessories, Services and Supplies, at any time. Interested suppliers should download solicitation document E60PV-19EQUI/D from CanadaBuys (SAP Ariba) and submit a response as per the requirements of the Request for Supply Arrangement.

Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada has a requirement for the supply and delivery of One (1) Bomb Calorimeter for Agriculture and Agri-Foot Canada, Lethbridge, Alberta, on or before March 31, 2024.
  
The mandatory technical criteria are: 

The responsive bidder already holding a Supply arrangement for Laboratory and Scientific Equipment, Parts and Accessories, Services and Supplies from Public Works and Government Services Canada who meets the mandatory technical criteria with the lowest aggregate price will be recommended for contract award.
duration_in_months: It appears that the input data does not conform to the expected format for this specific task. The output format and requirements are specified, but the input data does not seem to match the expected format. The expected output is a JSON object with specific keys and values based on the input data.Instead, the input data appears to be a large JSON object with multiple key-value pairs and nested objects. There is a lot of repetitive information, including two sets of French labels and values, which are likely for a multilingual application. The main issues are that the expected output keys do not have matching values in the input data, and some values are empty or do not make sense in the context of the expected output.
full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement: Bomb Calorimeter**
======================================================

**Request for Proposal - Solicitation Number: 01R11-24-C060**
--------------------------------------------------------

**Agency:** Agriculture Agri-Food Canada
**Region of Delivery:** Alberta

**Procurement Strategy:** Combination of Mandatory Requirements and Cost

Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada invites pre-qualified suppliers from the Laboratory and Scientific Equipment, Parts and Accessories, Services and Supplies Supply Arrangement (SA) E60PV-19EQUI to submit a bid for the supply and delivery of one (1) Bomb Calorimeter.

**Delivery Location:** Lethbridge, Alberta
**Delivery Date:** On or before March 31, 2024

**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP)
**Procurement Method:** Competitive - Selective Tendering

**Supplier Eligibility:**
-------------------------

Only suppliers currently pre-qualified on SA E60PV-19EQUI are eligible to submit a bid. Suppliers must have a valid SA for the supply of Laboratory and Scientific Equipment, Parts and Accessories, Services and Supplies with Public Works and Government Services Canada.

**Mandatory Technical Criteria:**
-------------------------------

* Supplier must be a responsive bidder with a valid SA for Laboratory and Scientific Equipment, Parts and Accessories, Services and Supplies from Public Works and Government Services Canada.
* Supplier must meet the mandatory technical criteria with the lowest aggregate price.

**Contact Information:**
-----------------------

For more information, please contact:
* Camille Sobczak, 204-430-5426, camille.sobczak@agr.gc.ca

**Notice URL:**
---------------

[Not Available]

**Attachment:**
--------------

*[Not Available]

**Tender Closing Date:** December 31, 2023, at 17:00:00

Mark your calendars for this competitive RFP and submit your bid before the closing date. For complete details, download the solicitation document and follow the instructions for proposal submission. Good luck!
